cluster_information.name: On/Off
cluster_information.description: Attributes and commands for turning devices on and off.

bitmap_fields.name: AcceptOnlyWhenOn
bitmap_fields.description: Indicates a command is only accepted when in On state

enum_values.name: Off
enum_values.description: Set the OnOff attribute to FALSE

enum_values.name: On
enum_values.description: Set the OnOff attribute to TRUE

enum_values.name: Toggle
enum_values.description: If the previous value of the OnOff attribute is equal to FALSE, set the OnOff attribute to TRUE. If the previous value of the OnOff attribute is equal to TRUE, set the OnOff attribute to FALSE (toggle).

enum_values.name: DelayedOffSlowFade
enum_values.description: 50% dim down in 0.8 seconds then fade to off in 12 seconds

enum_values.name: DyingLightFadeOff
enum_values.description: 20% dim up in 0.5s then fade to off in 1 second

parameters.name: EffectIdentifier
parameters.description: The effect to apply when turning off

parameters.name: OnOffControl
parameters.description: Control bitmap for timed off behavior

parameters.name: OnTime
parameters.description: Time in 1/10ths second to stay on

parameters.name: OffWaitTime
parameters.description: Time in 1/10ths second to wait before accepting another on command

attributes.name: OnOff
attributes.description: This attribute indicates whether the device type implemented on the endpoint is turned off or turned on, in these cases the value of the OnOff attribute equals FALSE, or TRUE respectively.

attributes.name: GlobalSceneControl
attributes.description: Used to prevent a second Off command storing the all-devices-off situation as a global scene, and to prevent a second On command destroying the current settings.

attributes.name: OnTime
attributes.description: Specifies the length of time (in 1/10ths second) that the On state SHALL be maintained before automatically transitioning to the Off state when using the OnWithTimedOff command.

attributes.name: OffWaitTime
attributes.description: Specifies the length of time (in 1/10ths second) that the Off state SHALL be guarded to prevent another OnWithTimedOff command turning the server back to its On state.

attributes.name: StartUpOnOff
attributes.description: Defines the desired startup behavior of a device when it is supplied with power. If the value is null, the OnOff attribute is set to its previous value.
